text: Ledce is name of several places in the Czech Republic: * Ledce (Brno-Country District) * Ledce (Hradec Králové District) * Ledce (Kadlín), part of municipality Kadlín, Mělník District * Ledce (Kladno District) * Ledce (Mladá Boleslav District) * Ledce (Nespeky), part of municipality Nespeky, Benešov District * Ledce (Plzeň-North District) ==See also== * Lidice, Kladno District ** Lidice massacre, 1942 * Lídice, Panama
title: Ledce
